content: **knitted hat in drops merino extra fine and drops kid-silk the piece is worked bottom up with rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-268 yarn group b + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** one-size fits head-size approx 54/58 cm **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 53 moss green and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 19 dark green **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 27 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
